channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 3 cases of new mpox strain reported in California

item.title: Mental exercise can reverse a brain change linked to aging, study finds
item.description: Scientists have found the first compelling evidence that cognitive training can boost levels of a brain chemical that typically declines as people age...

item.title: Reversing peanut advice prevented tens of thousands of allergy cases, researchers say

item.title: Some ant architects design a colony to cut the risk of disease. Humans, take note!
item.description: One kind of tiny ant can serve as a monumental example for how to keep members of a community safe from pathogens. A new study shows how they do it.

item.title: 'Cancer doesn't care': Patients pushed past divisive politics to lobby Congress

item.title: ‘Cancer Doesn’t Care’: Citizen Lobbyists Unite To Push Past Washington’s Ugly Politics
item.description: Despite a poisonous political climate, hundreds of volunteer advocates put partisan differences aside and pressed Congress to help people with cancer.

item.description: The "KFF Health News Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from our newsroom to the airwaves each week.
